title: Facebook’s employee revolt
description:
Over 400 Facebook employees didn't show up to work on Monday. Recode's Shirin Ghaffary explains the unprecedented unrest at the social media giant over President Trump’s posts.

Featuring
Shirin Ghaffary (@ShirinGhaffary)
Jeff Horwitz (@JeffHorwitz)

Links to resources discussed:
Many Facebook employees think the company needs to stand up to Trump now more than ever

Read the transcript of Mark Zuckerberg’s tense meeting with Facebook employees

Facebook Executives Shut Down Efforts to Make the Site Less Divisive

Host:
Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host and lead reporter of Reset
